columns.name: db_cluster_snapshot_identifier
columns.description: Specifies the identifier for a DB cluster snapshot. Must match the identifier of an existing snapshot.

columns.name: db_cluster_snapshot_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: snapshot_type
columns.description: Provides the type of the DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the status of this DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: Specifies the DB cluster identifier of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

columns.name: cluster_create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the DB cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

columns.name: allocated_storage
columns.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gibibytes (GiB).

columns.name: snapshot_create_time
columns.description: Provides the time when the snapshot was taken, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

columns.name: percent_progress
columns.description: Specifies the percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

columns.name: source_db_cluster_snapshot_arn
columns.description: If the DB cluster snapshot was copied from a source DB cluster snapshot, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source DB cluster snapshot, otherwise, a null value.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: Specifies the name of the database engine.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Provides the version of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: iam_database_authentication_enabled
columns.description: True if mapping of Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the Amazon KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: license_model
columns.description: Provides the license model information for this DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: master_username
columns.description: Not supported by Neptune.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the DB cluster was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster snapshot is encrypted.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VPC ID associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: Provides the list of EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the DB cluster snapshot can be restored in.

columns.name: db_cluster_snapshot_attributes
columns.description: A list of DB cluster snapshot attribute names and values for a manual DB cluster snapshot.
